mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Kelley, Benjamin Franklin
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Octo 27 1862. By Telegraph from Cumberland 10.10 pm 27 1862. The notorious guerilla Sam High of Hampshire Co. Va was killed today and his band dispersed he belonged to Imbodens Partizan Rangers B.F. Kelley Brig Genl22z88paid
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Kelley, Benjamin Franklin
Cumberland, Maryland
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
